ingredients.item: 180g pack raw extra large king prawns
2 tsp Clearspring Green Nori Sprinkle, plus extra for serving

instructions.step: Bring the stock to the boil in a large saucepan. Add the miso sauce and udon noodles and simmer, covered, for 5 minutes. Add the mushroom stir fry and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the prawns and simmer gently for 2 minutes until they have turned pink and the vegetables and noodles are tender.
Stir in the nori sprinkle. Serve in bowls with extra nori sprinkled on top.
